title: 84/490/EEC: Commission Decision of 8 October 1984 amending Council Decision 82/734/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Switzerland approved for the purposes of importing fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 8 October 1984
amending Council Decision 82/734/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Switzerland approved for the purposes of importing fresh meat into the Community
(84/490/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 82/734/EEC shall be replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 October 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
